content: तात्पर्यं [तत्परस्य भावः ष्यञ्] {@--1@} Purport, meaning, scope, अत्रेदं तात्पर्यं &c. {@--2@} Purport of propositions; <ls>K. P. 2.</ls> {@--3@} Aim, object, intended reference to any object, purpose, intention (with <ab>loc.</ab>); इह यथार्थकथने तात्पर्यं <ls>P. II. 3. 43</ls> <ab>Com.</ab> {@--4@} The object or intention of the speaker (in using particular words in a sentence); वक्तुरिच्छा तु तात्पर्यं परिकीर्तितं <ls>Bhāṣā P. 84</ls>; तात्पर्यानुपपत्तितः <ls n="Bhāṣā P.">82.</ls> {@--5@} Explanation. {@--6@} Entire devotion to or absorption in any object.
